title: 1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Culture, Heritage and the Gaeltacht
heading: 1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Culture, Heritage and the Gaeltacht
text_raw:
1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Culture, Heritage and the Gaeltacht 

(Alteration of Name of Department and Title of Minister) Order 2020. 

(2) This Order comes into operation on 30 September 2020.
text_norm: 1 (1) order may cited culture heritage gaeltacht (alteration name department title minister) order 2020 (2) order come operation 30 september 2020

title: 1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Culture, Heritage and the Gaeltacht
heading: 2. The name of the Department of State, the present name of which is, in
text_raw:
2. The name of the Department of State, the present name of which is, in 
the Irish language, an Roinn Cultúir, Oidhreachta agus Gaeltachta and, in the 
English language, the Department of Culture, Heritage and the Gaeltacht, is 
altered, in the Irish language, to that of An Roinn Turasóireachta, Cultúir, 
Ealaíon, Gaeltachta, Spóirt agus Meán and, in the English language, to that of 
the Department of Tourism, Culture, Arts, Gaeltacht, Sport and Media.
text_norm: 2 name department state present name irish language roinn cultuir oidhreachta agus gaeltachta english language department culture heritage gaeltacht altered irish language roinn turasoireachta cultuir ealaion gaeltachta spoirt agus mean english language department tourism culture art gaeltacht sport medium

title: 1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Culture, Heritage and the Gaeltacht
heading: 3. The title of the Minister having charge of the Department of State,
text_raw:
3. The title of the Minister having charge of the Department of State, 
whose present title is, in the Irish language, an tAire Cultúir, Oidhreachta agus 
Gaeltachta and, in the English language, the Minister for Culture, Heritage and 
the Gaeltacht is altered, in the Irish language, to that of an tAire 
Turasóireachta, Cultúir, Ealaíon, Gaeltachta, Spóirt agus Meán and, in the 
English language, to that of the Minister for Tourism, Culture, Arts, Gaeltacht, 
Sport and Media.

title: 1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Culture, Heritage and the Gaeltacht
heading: In any enactment or any instrument made under an enactment -
text_raw:
4. 

In any enactment or any instrument made under an enactment - 

(a) 

(b) 

references to the Department of Culture, Heritage and the 
Gaeltacht shall be construed as references to the Department of 
Tourism, Culture, Arts, Gaeltacht, Sport and Media; 

references to the Minister for Culture, Heritage and the 
Gaeltacht shall be construed as references to the Minister for 
Tourism, Culture, Arts, Gaeltacht, Sport and Media. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 2nd October, 2020. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [403] 3 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government, 

29 September, 2020. 

MICHEÁL MARTIN, 

Taoiseach. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [403]
